Package stochasticShortestPath

Class Epidemic

  • java.lang.Object
    • stochasticShortestPath.StochasticEvent
      • stochasticShortestPath.Epidemic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event

    class Epidemic
extends StochasticEvent
    An epidemic is a StochasticEvent Subclass. It creates an epidemic in which a population is renovated. The 5 best individuals always survive and the rest of the individuals in the population survive with chance comfort.
    Author:
    Manuel Serra

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.util.Comparator<Individual> comparator
      Comparator between individuals by their comfort, to decide the 5 fittest.
      protected Population pop
      Population where the epidemic takes place.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Epidemic

        Epidemic​(Population pop)
        Constructor for an Epidemic. It associated the epidemic with the population in which it occurs, and sets the individual association inherited from StochasticEvent to null. The type of event is also set.
        Parameters:
        pop - the population where the epidemic will take place

    • Method Detail

      • simulateEvent

        public void simulateEvent​()
        The simulateEvent() of an epidemic starts by sorting the population using the comparator, in order to find the 5 individuals with best comfort. For the remaining individuals, a random number is generated which will decide if each individual survives or not depending on their comfort. At the end, new ID's are given to the survivors.
        Specified by:
        simulateEvent in interface Event
        Specified by:
        simulateEvent in class StochasticEvent
